## What is Soham?

Soham is a multi-agent system designed to perform the work of multiple developers simultaneously. Imagine a virtual team of agents, each with their own specialty, collaborating to get things doneâ€”faster, smarter, and with a dash of fun!

> "Why do the work of one developer, when you can have a whole squad of digital agents?" ğŸ¤¹â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ¤–ğŸ¤–ğŸ¤–

> **Note:** This project was created for fun and experimentation!
